explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses various machine learning algorithms (BP, ELM, I-ELM, SVM) for corporate credit ratings.
explanations.supervised learning: The study involves supervised learning techniques as it compares algorithms for classification tasks based on labeled financial data.
explanations.classification: Corporate credit ratings involve classifying companies into different credit rating categories.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper explicitly mentions SVM as one of the learning algorithms compared in the study.
explanations.SVM: Abbreviation for Support Vector Machine, which is one of the key algorithms discussed.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions Artificial Neural Networks (ANNs) as one of the AI technologies used for credit ratings.
explanations.backpropagation: BP (Backpropagation) is one of the learning algorithms compared in the study.
explanations.BP: Abbreviation for Backpropagation, which is one of the key algorithms discussed.
